name: PvP Fishing
description:
PvP Fishing is a two player fishing game downloadable for the PC! Move around with WASD or the arrow keys, and pull the fish up to the surface to catch them. The one with the most points at the end of the round wins!

More fish appear every level, and you can even get upgrades at the shop.

PvP Fishing is a two player fishing game I made in Fall 2016. Updated a bit in 2018. I coding this all myself with help from a friend.
